citation.abstract: The development of tolerance in IgE-mediated allergies has been associated with lower cow's milk (CM)-specific IgE levels, increasing levels of specific IgG4 and, more contestably, IgA.

blogs.title: How to predict who will "outgrow" food allergy to cow's milk: low specific IgE, high IgA and high IgG4
blogs.summary:
The development of tolerance in IgE-mediated allergies has been associated with:

- lower cow's milk (CM)-specific IgE levels
- increasing levels of specific IgG4 
- increasing IgA

This study investigated if specific antibody responses to CM proteins diff

blogs.title: There is a difference between food sensitization (positive specific IgE) and food allergy. How to predict who will develop allergy?
